name: ISORROPIA (itch)
description:
[edit] If rotating a tile doesn't get you the expected result, please try refreshing the page. There might be one or two other bugs, which i will try to get rid of them as soon as possible, however i can't seem to reproduce them in my developing app, thus it might take a while [/edit]

ISORROPIA is a Tetris clone with a unique Twist. The game board is split in two and placed onto a scale. Try to keep the scale in mind when placing the tiles. It won't revolutionize the Tetris world, but it sure is a fun experiment :)

Proper introductions can be found in the game itself, just as well as the Keys. But just in case:

  • [z] to rotate counter clockwise
  • [x] to rotate clockwise
  • [space] to instantly hit the ground
  • [ArrowKeys] to move
  • [M] to toggle Music
  • [ESC] for the pause/exit menu

Made in under one week for Game Endevaours GameJam#3 with the theme "Duality". 

https://itch.io/jam/ge-jam-3

Due to working on it until the last minute it's not quite as optimized as it could have been. But it is playable and that's the important part. I literally worked on it until the last minute, thus I hope everything works out fine.

Idea / Coding / Art by me (Kibate)
